All Notes:
  • Interpreting backward models (Haufe et al. 2014) [20 Sep 2021]

    This set of notes include explanation and derivations for the backward model interpretation approach from Haufe et al. 2014.

  • Chapter 6. Spectial Functions [09 Sep 2021]

    This set of notes is based on Chapter 6 in Numerical Recipes in C.

  • DataLad Cheatsheet [19 Aug 2020]

    This set of notes include important DataLad (and related) commands, extracted from the DataLad Handbook INM7 version (~v0.12).

  • Chapter 14. Statistical Description of Data [02 Dec 2019]

    This set of notes is based on Chapter 14 in Numerical Recipes in C.

  • Useful Commands [10 Oct 2019]

    This set of notes include commands for Unix, Bash, Matlab, Python, etc. that I found useful or easily forgotten.

  • Chapter 2. Solution of Linear Algebraic Equations [19 Sep 2019]

    This set of notes is based on Chapter 2 in Numerical Recipes in C.

  • Distributions and Derivations [17 Apr 2019]

    This set of notes include information and derivations for some statistical distributions, including gamma distribution and the t-distribution.

  • Relevance Vector Machine and Fast Implementation [31 Jan 2019]

    This set of notes include explanation and derivations for The Tipping 2001 paper on RVM and his 2006 paper on a fast implementation of RVM.

  • Auto-Encoding Variational Bayes & Application to Biomedical Segmentation [30 Jul 2018]

    This set of notes include explanation and derivations for my Journal club presentation on 9 July 2018 (application), as well as some derivations for Minhâ€™s presentation on 2 July 2018 (general).
